answers.text:
Hi Donald,
We actually received a question similar to this one on the Knowledge Network a couple of years ago. Here's the question, complete with several resources:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20640
You can also find plenty of resources on this topic on the Knowledge Network's Performance Appraisals topic page:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/topic/197/performance_appraisals
I hope this helps to answer your question. please let us know if we can be of any more help.
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA
